title.value: Radiation hardness of open Fabry-Pérot microcavities
title.justification: The title directly reflects the primary investigation of the paper, which is the radiation hardness of the Fabry-Pérot microcavities.
title.quote: Radiation hardness of open Fabry-Pérot microcavities

extractions.description: The paper investigates the radiation hardness of high-finesse Fabry-Pérot microcavities formed from dielectric mirrors. It explores their durability under conventional and ultrahigh radiotherapy dose rates, aiming at applications for real-time, in-vivo radiation dosimeters and other high-radiation environments.

type.justification: The paper involves experimental evaluation and measurement of the radiation hardness of microcavities.
type.quote: Here, we investigate the radiation hardness of Fabry-Pérot microcavities...

name.justification: The research is focused on dosimetry and applications in radiotherapy, a key area within medical physics.
name.quote: External beam radiotherapy (EBT) is one of the most common treatments for cancer worldwide.

name.justification: The paper deals with high-finesse optical microcavities and their use in sensing applications.
